head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WIGGS, DOROTHY L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WIGGS, DOROTHY L.

block.p: WIGGS-Dorothy L. Beloved grandmother of Karyn and Steve Rotter, Deborah Wiggs, Joan Goldfeder, and Carol and Ken Adeshek, and great grand children Gabe, Emily and Julie, Eli and Michael. We'll miss you, Nanny. Rest peacefully. Love, Karen and Steve

WIGGS-Dorothy L., died June 13. Wife of the late Dr. Harvey A. Wiggs. Loving mother of Dr. Richard Wiggs and the late Helen Goldfeder. Cherished grandmother and great-grandmother. Services private. Tributes to Sephardic Home for the Aged, Brooklyn.

WIGGS-Dorothy L. Beloved grandmother of Karyn and Steve Rotter, Deborah Wiggs, Joan Goldfeder, and Carol and Ken Adeshek, and great grand children Gabe, Emily and Julie, Eli and Michael. We'll miss you, Nanny. Rest peacefully. Love, Karen and Steve
